scope: Monthly trust account reconciliation for all client trust accounts

findings.description: Minor discrepancy in check register ($2.50) - resolved
findings.resolution: Mathematical error corrected in December statements

conclusion: Trust accounts properly maintained and reconciled. All client funds accounted for.

scope: Conflict check for new trademark infringement matter - Tech Brand case
conclusion: No conflicts identified. Matter approved for engagement.
notes: Comprehensive search conducted across all current and former clients

scope: Annual document retention and destruction audit

findings.description: 12 closed case files from 2016 eligible for destruction but not processed
findings.resolution: Files scheduled for secure destruction per retention policy

findings.description: Digital storage organization could be improved

conclusion: Generally compliant with retention policies. Improvements recommended.
recommendations: Update retention policy to include electronic communications

scope: Quarterly IOLTA account compliance review
conclusion: All IOLTA requirements met. Interest properly disbursed to State Bar.

scope: Annual cybersecurity and data protection assessment

findings.description: Multi-factor authentication not enabled for all users
Some workstations missing latest security patches
Password complexity policy could be strengthened
findings.resolution: New password policy implemented requiring 14+ characters

conclusion: Security posture improved. Critical vulnerabilities addressed.
recommendations: Review and update incident response plan

scope: Random sample review of 25 client files for completeness and compliance

findings.description: Billing time entries could be more detailed in 5 files
findings.resolution: Training provided to associates on time entry best practices

conclusion: Files generally well-maintained. Minor improvements implemented.

scope: Anti-money laundering and Know Your Customer compliance review

findings.description: Client verification documentation incomplete for 2 new clients

conclusion: AML/KYC procedures generally followed. Documentation improved.

scope: Review of billing rates, time entries, and invoice accuracy for Q3 2024

findings.description: Minor calculation errors in 3 invoices (< $100 each)
findings.resolution: Errors corrected and credit memos issued

conclusion: Billing processes accurate and compliant. 99.8% accuracy rate.

scope: Annual review of professional liability insurance coverage
conclusion: Coverage adequate and compliant with state bar requirements.

scope: CLE compliance audit for all attorneys

findings.description: 2 associates need to complete ethics credits by year-end

conclusion: All attorneys compliant with CLE requirements for 2024.

scope: GDPR and CCPA compliance review

findings.description: Privacy policy needs updating for CCPA amendments
Data processing agreements missing for 3 vendors
findings.resolution: DPAs executed with all third-party vendors

conclusion: Data privacy practices compliant. Policies updated.

scope: Conflict check for medical malpractice case
conclusion: No conflicts identified. Matter approved.

scope: Monthly trust account reconciliation
conclusion: All trust accounts properly reconciled and maintained.

scope: Review of case management system data integrity and backups

findings.description: Backup verification process could be automated

conclusion: System functioning properly. Backups verified and secure.

scope: Review of engagement letters for 2024 new matters

findings.description: Standard engagement letter template needs updating for fee changes
findings.resolution: Template updated with current rate schedule

conclusion: 98% of matters have properly executed engagement letters.

scope: Quarterly financial controls and segregation of duties review

findings.description: Need additional separation between billing and collections
findings.resolution: Billing specialist role created to improve controls

conclusion: Financial controls adequate with recommended improvements.

scope: Review of e-discovery procedures and technology

findings.description: E-discovery protocols need updating for new case types
findings.resolution: Protocols updated and staff training conducted

conclusion: E-discovery practices meet current standards.

scope: Annual client satisfaction survey and feedback analysis

findings.description: Response time to client calls could be improved
findings.resolution: Implemented client communication protocol with 4-hour response target

conclusion: Overall client satisfaction: 92%. Strong performance across all metrics.

scope: Conflict check for criminal defense matter
conclusion: No conflicts identified. Engagement approved.

scope: Annual review of mandatory staff training completion

findings.description: 3 staff members need to complete annual ethics training

conclusion: 100% compliance with mandatory training requirements.
